otherNames: Kimetsu no Yaiba 2 Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Season 2 Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Entertainment District Arc; 鬼滅の刃 遊郭編
synopsis: After visiting the Rengoku residence, Tanjirou and his comrades volunteer for a mission within the Entertainment District, a place where desires are sold and demons dwell. They journey alongside the flashy Sound Hashira, Tengen Uzui, in search of a monstrous foe terrorizing the town. Sworn to slay creatures of the night, the hunt continues.
